knowledge.name: HTML
knowledge.description: Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

knowledge.name: CSS
knowledge.description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML.

knowledge.name: Responsive Design
knowledge.description: Responsive web design (RWD) is an approach to web design that makes web pages render well on a variety of devices and window or screen sizes.

knowledge.name: JavaScript
knowledge.description: JavaScript is a programming language that enables interactive web pages and is an essential part of web development.

knowledge.name: Version Control
knowledge.description: Version control is a system that records changes to a file or set of files over time so that you can recall specific versions later.

knowledge.name: Advanced HTML/CSS
knowledge.description: Advanced techniques in HTML and CSS.

knowledge.name: CSS Preprocessors
knowledge.description: Tools that extend the capabilities of CSS.

knowledge.name: TypeScript
knowledge.description: A typed superset of JavaScript.

knowledge.name: Frameworks
knowledge.description: Collections of pre-written code to aid in software development.

knowledge.name: Libraries
knowledge.description: Reusable code modules that provide specific functionality.

knowledge.name: Asynchronous requests
knowledge.description: Handling asynchronous operations in web development.

knowledge.name: Promise
knowledge.description: A JavaScript object representing the eventual completion or failure of an asynchronous operation.

knowledge.name: Performance Optimization
knowledge.description: Techniques to improve the performance of web applications.

knowledge.name: Accessibility
knowledge.description: Ensuring web content is usable by as many people as possible, including those with disabilities.

knowledge.name: Testing
knowledge.description: Processes and tools for verifying that software meets its requirements and behaves as expected.

knowledge.name: UX/UI Design Principles
knowledge.description: Guidelines and best practices for designing user interfaces and improving user experience.

knowledge.name: Responsive Web Design
knowledge.description: Design approach that ensures web applications render well on a variety of devices and window or screen sizes.

knowledge.name: Advanced JavaScript
knowledge.description: In-depth knowledge and understanding of advanced JavaScript concepts.

knowledge.name: Server-side languages
knowledge.description: Languages used for server-side programming, such as Python, Node.js, Ruby, etc.

knowledge.name: API Design
knowledge.description: Principles and best practices for designing APIs (Application Programming Interfaces).

knowledge.name: Security
knowledge.description: Methods and techniques to protect web applications from threats and vulnerabilities.

knowledge.name: DevOps
knowledge.description: Collaborative practices that aim to unify software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops).
